portaudio::CFunCallbackStream

portaudio::CFunCallbackStream Class Reference

Callback stream using a free function with C linkage. It's important that the function the passed function pointer points to is declared ``extern "C"''. More...

#include <CFunCallbackStream.hxx>

CFunCallbackStream & operator= (const CFunCallbackStream &)

Detailed Description

Callback stream using a free function with C linkage. It's important that the function the passed function pointer points to is declared ``extern "C"''.
